title: Analyze and Report on Building Energy Use
description: A sustainability officer requests a report on the energy consumption of all city-owned buildings for the last year.

tasks.description: Retrieve historical energy consumption data for all city-owned buildings from their respective BMS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully queries and aggregates the energy data.

tasks.description: Analyze the data to rank the buildings from most to least energy-efficient per square foot.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a ranked list identifying the least efficient buildings.

tasks.description: Generate a summary report with visualizations to be sent to the sustainability officer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a comprehensive report with charts and key findings.
